nhc_headline: ...PILAR FORECAST TO PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLASH FLOODING IN PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS...
summary:
...PILAR FORECAST TO PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLASH FLOODING IN PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS...
 As of 7:00 AM CDT Mon Oct 30
 the center of Pilar was located near 11.0, -91.5
 with movement ENE at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.
